Hence, a big factor - trust - is something you will find with Dr. Abhisheak.

Apart from this - I had been a having a tooth cavity and decayed wisdom tooth in the other areas. I had been delaying my treatment for quite sometime. Sometimes when I felt over-bearing pain - he was available for quick checkin on WhatsApp. I really liked this - because the treatment does not end with the procedure - there is a lot of post-procedure care needed. This is mostly not available in other places.

Thus, I had an overall outstanding experience with Dr. Abhisheak and SLV Dental. Biggest factors for me - trust, right diagnosis, seamless and professional, friendliness and post-procedure quick checkins.
